CommandReport.Name: open
CommandReport.Description: Opens the specification editor web tool

ArgumentReport.Name: path
ArgumentReport.Description: Path to the StoryTeller project file or the project directory

FlagReport.Description: Specify a build target to force Storyteller to choose that profile. By default, ST will use 'Debug'
Storyteller test mode profile for systems like Serenity that use this
Optional. Default project timeout in seconds.
Optional. Only runs tests with desired lifecyle
Optional. Applies extra logging to see progress within TeamCity during CI runs
Optional. Override the config file selection of the Storyteller test running AppDomain
Sets a minimum number of retry attempts for this execution

UsageReport.Description: Opens the specification editor web tool

CommandReport.Name: run
CommandReport.Description: Run a suite of StoryTeller tests

ArgumentReport.Name: path
ArgumentReport.Description: Path to the StoryTeller project file or the project directory

FlagReport.Description: Path to write out the results. Default is stresults.htm
Optional. Runs only one workspace
Open the results in a browser after the run. DO NOT DO THIS IN CI!
Write the performance data in CSV format to the specified path
Write the raw result information to JSON format at the specified path
Dump the raw JSON history of the batch run to the specified path
Specify a build target to force Storyteller to choose that profile. By default, ST will use 'Debug'
Storyteller test mode profile for systems like Serenity that use this
Optional. Default project timeout in seconds.
Optional. Only runs tests with desired lifecyle
Optional. Applies extra logging to see progress within TeamCity during CI runs
Optional. Override the config file selection of the Storyteller test running AppDomain
Sets a minimum number of retry attempts for this execution

CommandReport.Name: doc-run
CommandReport.Description: Run the documentation in a live mode

FlagReport.Description: The documentation directory. The default is 'documentation'
Override the application version. Default is 'Unknown'
Override the directories where sample scanning should be enabled. Default is [src]

UsageReport.Description: Run the documentation in a live mode

CommandReport.Name: doc-seed
CommandReport.Description: Seeds a topic file structure from an outline.txt file

FlagReport.Description: The documentation directory. The default is 'documentation'
Override the application version. Default is 'Unknown'
Override the directories where sample scanning should be enabled. Default is [src]

UsageReport.Description: Seeds a topic file structure from an outline.txt file

CommandReport.Name: doc-export
CommandReport.Description: Export a documentation project to static html

ArgumentReport.Name: destination
ArgumentReport.Description: The destination folder where the docs should be exported to

ArgumentReport.Name: exportmode
ArgumentReport.Description: Controls how the urls within the documentation topic pages are generated

FlagReport.Description: The documentation directory. The default is 'documentation'
Override the application version. Default is 'Unknown'
Override the directories where sample scanning should be enabled. Default is [src]

UsageReport.Description: Export a documentation project to static html
